attributes.action: Scrap Brexit Deal Negotiations, Declare "No Deal" and adopt/commit WTO terms.
attributes.additional_details:
The UK's Electorate is sick and tired of Parliament, our PM, and our MP's ignoring us and acting according to their/its own will and agenda. We elected you to enact our will and DEMAND that you do so, starting with delivering the goal of this petition.
Inform the EU that negotiations are closed and we are leaving on 29th March 2019 with NO DEAL.
Deliver the UK a "WTO BREXIT", NO MORE DELAY, NO MORE REFERENDUMS, NO MORE FALSE PROMISES.
Out faith in Goverment and Parliament is Eroded Enough!
attributes.background: Enough messing around, enough Parliamentary infighting and Political Posturing. Drop the inter-party and cross-party competition and get us Out of the EU with NO DEAL. We want WTO, deals with EU can be discussed after our UNCONDITIONAL EXIT has been Delivered, ON SCHEDULE on 29 March 2019.
